channel.title: How to fix a server problem?
channel.description: I have 3 problems and i don't know how to solve them? Maybe you can help? [b]Problem 1:[/b] When a human comes into my server he gets a lot of good things like whip, fighter torso, dds, 25mil. ... And i think this is too much for a 3 lvl. Do anyone knows how to fix that problem? [b]Problem 2:[/b] When i want to drop something my server writes: "drop is dissabled in this server if you want to get rid of your items write ::empty." And i don't know how to fix this. [b]Problem 3:[/b] and the last problem all levels rises to fast. For example you hit 1 time to a lvl 2 man and your str is 10. How to fix this problem? (my server type is Godz Gamerz 2009)

item.title: How to fix a server problem?
item.dc:creator: @Mnx Mnx
item.description:
@Mnx wrote:

I have 3 problems and i don’t know how to solve them? Maybe you can help?
Problem 1: When a human comes into my server he gets a lot of good things like whip, fighter torso, dds, 25mil. … And i think this is too much for a 3 lvl. Do anyone knows how to fix that problem?
Problem 2: When i want to drop something my server writes: “drop is dissabled in this server if you want to get rid of your items write ::empty.” And i don’t know how to fix this.
Problem 3: and the last problem all levels rises to fast. For example you hit 1 time to a lvl 2 man and your str is 10. How to fix this problem? (my server type is Godz Gamerz 2009)

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix a server problem?
